<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs=""
>
[Experienced Harrower](/Feats.aspx?ID=4154) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Stolen Fate</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Stolen Fate Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=197) pg. 13</row>

**Archetype** [Harrower](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=204)

**Access**
This feat is available to all players in a Stolen Fate campaign

</column>

---

When you perform the [_harrowing_](/Rituals.aspx?ID=100) ritual, the DC for the Primary Check is never more than the [standard DC by level](/Rules.aspx?ID=554), and the cost for the ritual is halved. If you use a [fine harrow deck](/Equipment.aspx?ID=824), the cost for the ritual is removed entirely.
